person.persName: Herschel Clay Baker (Adair County, KY, attorney)

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, attorney. Cumberland County, Kentucky, native. Son of E. C. Baker and Sarah M. Alexander Baker. College student in Adair County in 1860. Graduate of Centre College in Danville, Kentucky, in 1862. Studied law under Thomas T. Alexander. Admitted to the bar in 1863. Appointed master commissioner of the Adair Circuit Court in 1864.
